summary.text: Social Security COLA Act of 1984 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide that cost-of-living adjustments under the OASDI program shall take effect three months earlier each year. Provides that cost-of-living adjustments are to be based solely on increases in the Consumer Price Index for all urban consumers. Eliminates the three percent trigger for such cost-of-living increases.
